title: Air Conditioning Issue - Master Bedroom
description: Client reported that the air conditioning unit in the master bedroom is not cooling effectively. Needs immediate attention before viewing.

comments.author: Sarah Chen
comments.content: Client mentioned this during the phone inquiry. Scheduling maintenance check.

title: Pool Maintenance Required
description: Weekly pool cleaning and chemical balancing needed before weekend viewings

comments.author: Alex Johnson
comments.content: Pool cleaning scheduled for tomorrow morning. Will update with photos.

title: Touch-up Paint Work
description: Minor scuff marks on walls in living room need touch-up painting

comments.author: David Lee
comments.content: Paint work completed. Property is now viewing-ready.

title: Elevator Maintenance Notice
description: Building management scheduled elevator maintenance. Need to inform potential buyers about temporary inconvenience.

comments.author: David Lim
comments.content: Will reschedule viewings to avoid maintenance hours (9 AM - 12 PM tomorrow).
